meanings.definition: Offensive slang term for a Japanese person.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a jap from Tokyo.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant is owned by a friendly jap.
meanings.sent3: The kids giggled when they saw the jap wearing a kimono.
meanings.sent4: She thought it was a jap who delivered the sushi, but it was actually a Korean man.
meanings.sent5: The image of the smiling jap in the advertisement stuck in my mind.

meanings.sent1: I love learning about the jap culture.
meanings.sent2: The label on the product said 'Made in Jap'.
meanings.sent3: She proudly displayed her collection of Jap art.
meanings.sent4: The book was written by a renowned Jap author.
meanings.sent5: The Jap language sounds beautiful when spoken.

meanings.definition: Shortened form of 'jape', meaning a practical joke or prank.
meanings.sent1: He played a jap on his sister by hiding her favorite toy.
meanings.sent2: The students planned a jap on their teacher for April Fools' Day.
meanings.sent3: The jap they pulled on him was harmless and made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: She fell for the jap and couldn't stop laughing.
meanings.sent5: The jap they pulled was so clever, it became legendary in school.
